ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Planes time for ELfson!
ygData.msgSnippet: or you can dish out 300pp for a shaman gate potion, they have 2 kinds: gate to everfrost and gate to innothule swamp. that reminds me i gotta get some ...
ygData.messageBody:
or you can dish out 300pp for a shaman gate potion, they have 2 kinds: gate
to everfrost and gate to innothule swamp.
that reminds me i gotta get some

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: October 5, 2000 1:09 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Planes time for ELfson!


I did a 15-hour Hate raid last Saturday. Had a great time - but only one
Bard Item dropped (Imbrued Arms) and I lost the lotto (to only one other
bard). I did win the lotto for a Diamond that has been going for 1-1.5K on
my server these days.

One thing to keep in mind about Hate - the only way out is to TP. It's a
good time to find a Cazic-Thule Gate potion in case you need to go when no
Druids or Wizards want to TP out...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 9:38 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Planes time for ELfson!


there ya go you're all set 8)

My guild spent a couple days in hate last week and i know the rogues got
decked out pretty good, i am not sure what else but i do know there was only
1 shaman up there and he got his bp, and my other shaman friend that needed
one was logged out up there and none had his pwd to log in to loot the one
that rotted away. What else, i think the only bard that was up there went LD
and a bp rotted away because she could not get back on, i do not know if she
was able to loot the other 2 that dropped, i hope for her sake. Other then
that, we're only 3 bards in guild, and 1 of those is an alt which got decked
out completely second last trip up.

Im just tryin to encourage ya 8) I cant wait to go up. A friend said he'd
help me level up once he got to lev 60, he's 2 bubbles away, i cant wait
